resources.string: The Boy The Mole The Fox and The Horse
\"What is the bravest thing you have ever said?\" asked the boy.\n\"Help,\" said the horse.
\"What do you want to be when you grow up?\"\n\"Kind,\" said the boy.
\"What do you think is the biggest waste of time?\"\n\"Comparing yourself to others,\" said the mole.
\"Do you have any other advice?\" asked the boy.\n\"Do not measure how valuable you are by the way you are treated,\" said the horse.
\“The greatest illusion,\" said the mole, \"is that life should be perfect.\"
\“One of our greatest freedoms is how we react to things.\”
\"Always remember you matter, you are important and you are loved, and you bring to this world things no one else can.\"
\“We often wait for kindness, but being kind to yourself can start now.\”
\“We have such a long way to go,\" sighed the boy\n\"Yes, but look how far we have come,\" said the horse
\“Sometimes I think you believe in me more than I do,\" said the boy\n\"You will catch up,\" said the horse.
